name: B. Select one of the following:
C. Geographic Focus: Two upper-division courses in one geographic area

child.name: Visit the Global and International Studies website for a list of approved courses. Although some courses are listed in more than one focus, students may not double count a course for both their geographic and global focus. Study abroad counts as one course in the geographic focus.

name: D. Global Focus: Three upper-division courses. At least one must be from Module A.

child.name: Visit the Global and International Studies website (https://www.globalstudies.uci.edu/) for a list of approved courses. Although some courses are listed in more than one focus, students may not double count a course for both their geographic and global focus. Study abroad counts as one course in the geographic focus.
